san-lo-mvu12:7: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam etad uvāca || bho jinaputra bodhisatvā avaivartikā caturthībhūmito ye paṁcamāṁ bhūmiṁ saṁkrāmanti teṣāṁ katamaṁ sandhicittaṁ bhavatīti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || ādīptāṁ sarvabhavāṁ paśyanti rāgadveṣamohebhyaḥ | aśaraṇyaṁ nirānandaṁ sandhicittaṁ catuḥpaṁcamānantaraṁ bhavatīti ||
san-lo-mvu12:8: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye punar bho  jinaputra samyaksaṁbuddhena bhagavatā paṁcamāyāṁ bhūmau samyaksaṁbuddhāḥ pūjitās teṣāṁ samyaksaṁbuddhānāṁ kāni nāmāni gotrāṇi kevattā śrāvakasannipātā kevattikā prabhā kevattikam āyuḥpramāṇam iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākaśyapaṁ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣi ||
san-lo-mvu12:13: nāmaṁ tasya yaśavrato abhūṣi atisundaro buddho ||
san-lo-mvu12:14: gotreṇa gautamo ’sau ayaṁ ca bhagavān tadāsi śreṣṭhisuto |
san-lo-mvu12:16: yaṁ maye kuśalam upacitaṁ saṁśliṣya saṁghe arhante dattvā |
san-lo-mvu12:17: tena paramārthadarśī bhaveyam akhilaṁ mamaṁ puṇyaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:18: antim’ avataraṇagāmī sundaro sudarśano nāma narasiṁhaḥ |
san-lo-mvu12:22: rājā ca cakravartī abhūṣi dharaṇīṁdharo ti nāmena |
san-lo-mvu12:23: so taṁ jinaṁ sudarśanaṁ saśiṣyasaṁghaṁ idam uvāca ||
san-lo-mvu12:24: sarvaṁ hitopadhānaṁ ahaṁ ti demi iti paṇḍito avacī |
san-lo-mvu12:25: evaṁ ca bhaveyam ahaṁ praṇidhesi paraṁ praṇidhi rājā ||
san-lo-mvu12:29: gotreṇa ca vāsiṣṭho ābhā daśayojanā tasya ||
san-lo-mvu12:30: vaśibhūtānāṁ koṭī parivāro tasya dvādaśa āsi |
san-lo-mvu12:31: nava ca varṣasaharāṇi manujāna tadā abhūṣy āyuḥ ||
san-lo-mvu12:32: rājā ca cakravartī abhūṣi aparājito ti nāmena |
san-lo-mvu12:33: so daśabalaṁ narendraṁ prasannacitto idam uvāca ||
san-lo-mvu12:35: śīti catur uttarā tava vibhū vihārān ahaṁ demi ||
san-lo-mvu12:36: so taṁ dānaṁ dattvā tasmiṁ nareśvarake anupraṇidhiṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:38: vijayo nāma amātyo abhūṣi pūrvaṁ jinaḥ suprabho nāma |
san-lo-mvu12:39: gotreṇa kāśyapo ’sau prabhā ca daśayojanā tasya ||
san-lo-mvu12:40: tasya ca śiṣyasaṁgho aṣṭādaśa koṭī dhutarajānāṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:42: so vandya jinavaraṁ taṁ vijayo nimantrayī bhavanirghātiṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:43: adhivāsayati daśabalo atha vijayo harṣito āsi ||
san-lo-mvu12:46: so ’ham api bhaveyam evaṁ naravaramahito naramaruṇa hitakaro|
san-lo-mvu12:48: āsīt pūrvaṁ buddhas tathāgato ratanaparvato nāma |
san-lo-mvu12:49: gotreṇa gautamo ’sau prabhā ca daśayojanā tasya ||
san-lo-mvu12:52: rājā ca cakravartī abhūṣi tatkālam acyuto nāma |
san-lo-mvu12:53: jinakramāṇi nipīḍiya idam avaci varaṁ naramarūṇāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:62: tasya śubhakarmajātā śarīraprabhā abhū yojanāni ṣaṭ* |
san-lo-mvu12:64: daśa ṣaḍvarṣā āyuṁ tadā abhūṣi manujānāṁ ca caturdaśa sahasrāṇi |
san-lo-mvu12:66: āsi tada cakravartī rājā priyadarśano ti nāmena |
san-lo-mvu12:71: tān tava dadāmi vīrā saśiṣyasaṁghasya nirapekṣaḥ ||
san-lo-mvu12:72: yad bhojanaṁ ṛṣīṇāṁ yad vastraṁ yā ca oṣadhividhīyo |
san-lo-mvu12:73: yāni śayanāsanāni ca prāsādavare tathā yeva ||
san-lo-mvu12:74: niḥsṛṣṭam eva sarvaṁ paribhojyaṁ yasya dvādaśākāraṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:76: etad dattvā dānaṁ so pārthivalambako anupraṇidhiṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:85: manujāna evaṁ na vimati kāryā tatropadeśasmiṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:86: pārthivo caiva narapatī taṁ kālaṁ āsi durjayo nāma |
san-lo-mvu12:88: kṛtakarapuṭo prasannaḥ naraprabho puṣpadantam idam āha |
san-lo-mvu12:90: adhivāsanaṁ viditvā rājāsya durjayarddhi bala eva |
san-lo-mvu12:99: atha manasā praṇidheti tadā va so taṁ anupraṇidhiṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:100: tvam iva-m-ahaṁ saṁbuddho dharmaṁ prakāśayeya naramarūṇāṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:104: tasya ca svaśarīrajātā prabhā abhū yojanāni triṁśa duve |
san-lo-mvu12:106: āyuṁ tadā narāṇāṁ varṣasahasrāṇi āsi caturaśītiṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:107: rājā ca tadā āsī caturaṁgabalo priyo manāpo ||
san-lo-mvu12:109: kārayati bhūmipālo pravaraṁ ekaṁ ca prāsādaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:110: śayyāsanaṁ ca vipulaṁ kārayate pārthivo nirupavadyaṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:121: āsi tadā manujānāṁ caturguṇa eṣa caturaśīti ||
san-lo-mvu12:122: rājā tadā abhūṣī nāmena so mṛgapatisvaro nāma |
san-lo-mvu12:128: taṁ tatra vādisiṁhaṁ ṛṣabhaṁ so bhojanena saptāhaṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:130: taṁ suravaravana-upamaṁ tato vanaṁ tasya satvasārasya |
san-lo-mvu12:135: kuśalena hi me tena tathāgatabalo vibhū bhomi ||
san-lo-mvu12:138: tasya ca prabhā śarīre yojanaśatavistarā samantena |
san-lo-mvu12:140: tasya saṁgho āsī navanavati koṭiyī dhūtarajānāṁ |
san-lo-mvu12:141: varṣāṇāṁ ca sahasrāṇi caturāśītiṁ tadā āyuṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:142: rājā tada cakravarti abhūṣi cāturdvīpo mahisthāmo |
san-lo-mvu12:143: nāmena maṇiviṣāṇo śāsati dharmeṇa yo janatāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu12:148: prathamadivasaṁ ca sugataṁ bhojetvā sārdhaṁ śiṣyasaṁghena |
san-lo-mvu12:150: so taṁ dānaṁ datvā tasya mahāpudgalasya rājavaro |
san-lo-mvu12:154: evam eva aprameyā paṁcamyāṁ bhūmiyāṁ puruṣasiṁhāḥ |
san-lo-mvu12:156: saṁpūjitā bhagavatā ime tathānye tathāgatāḥ sarve |
san-lo-mvu12:159: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye bho jinaputra bodhisatvā bodhāye praṇidhenti te katibhir ākāraiḥ pañcamāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ ṣaṣṭhāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || caturbhi bho jinaputra ākārair dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvā bodhāye ye praṇidhenti paṁcamāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || katamehi caturhi || samyaksaṁbuddhānuśāsane pravrajitvā yogācārehi sārdhaṁ sambhuvaṁ kurvanti | aṣṭamake dhutavedanāgṛddhā bhāvanā uttrasanti | śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābahulāś ca abhīkṣṇaṁ viharanti | ālaṁbaṇālaṁbaṇacittaṁ hetuśo parikalpenti || ye hi keci bho dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvā bodhāya praṇidhento paṁcamāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānā ṣaṣṭhyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti sarve te imehi caturhi ākārehi vivartensuḥ vivartanti vivartiṣyanti vā ||
san-lo-mvu12:161: ity eṣā paṁcamī bhūmī vyākṛtā saṁnidarśitā |
